summary: This module contains unit tests that validate the DynamoDB‑based online store implementation of the Feast feature store. It sets up mock DynamoDB tables, creates repository configurations, and exercises store configuration, read and write operations, including batch writes and deduplication logic.
business_intent: To guarantee that the DynamoDB online store correctly handles feature data storage and retrieval, and that its configuration options work as expected, thereby providing reliable online serving for machine‑learning features.
